task.shortdesc: This section gives the information how to add the domain configuration in ICD.

context.p: Domains define the values that are allowed in the fields. They can be available in lookup list dialog boxes that are also referred to as Select Value lists. Domains also define the values that can be typed directly in a field. Domains helps to ensure that valid and consistent data is entered and reported on. Domains are used throughout the product.

step.cmd: In the End Points application, click Domain option.
Create the domain to configure the JIRA Endpoint in the domain application, then go to domain application
Use Add New Domain option and select Add New ALN Domain.
A message box prompts you to provide the information about domain name, domain type and the length.
You can add JIRA value and the decsciption by using the New Row. You can view or modify the ALN domain values by using View/Modify conditions
